Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review all sound prototypes and music sketches.
Finalize the sound design document, including all sound effects and music themes.
Break. Browse for additional sound inspiration.
Prepare a presentation of the sound design for the team meeting.
Present the sound design to the team in the weekly meeting. Gather feedback.
Incorporate team feedback into the sound design document.
Email the finalized sound design document to @prod-1 for approval.
Wrap up the week by organizing all files and notes.
